text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Well then, that should be enough materials for the first draft. 
Please give me your honest opinion on them.

text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.
text_block_list.text:
Sure, sure. These are good. Fufu, it sure was interesting 
looking through all these high-spirit spots.

text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.
text_block_list.text:
The places that everyone showed off were completely all 
over the place. Not to mention what made them feel alive 
differed too. It really captured the individuality of each person.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Yes. The student council and I got to see and feel a variety of 
different places. From there we were able to feel a wide depth 
of emotion. It really was a good learning experience.

text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.
text_block_list.text:
No matter what kind of "high-spirit spot" people brought up, 
it all circled back to their thoughts of races.

text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.
text_block_list.text:
And this is… "A cultural exchange with horsegirls 
from outside the school that we raced with." 
Pokke and her friends sure are amusing.

text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.
text_block_list.text:
Ha ha. This group photo is nice. "A high-spirited friendship 
born from an earnest race with each other".

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
A race that can connect the feelings of 
so many people… That is a good piece.

text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.
text_block_list.text: Yes. Once again, their experiences mirrored ours.

text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.
text_block_list.text:
What is this? A photo from the open campus? 
I see. So, she really did come.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Ha ha. I was also surprised who sent the photo.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
These photos were said to capture "the place where 
the academy nurtures the race of the future."

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
The students and the children who would step on the turf in the 
future were able to come together and demonstrate the feeling 
of creating a "high-spirited future."

text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.
text_block_list.text: Ha ha. That's just like her.

text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.
text_block_list.text:
Other submissions include a "snapshot of a cafeteria of 
high-spirited eaters" and a "high-spirited showcase 
of tail care items." I see.

text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.
text_block_list.text: Fufu. I got to see a lot of different things but… Yeah.

text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.
text_block_list.text: At least right now, the pamphlet is still far from finished.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Right you are. We still lack enough items that we can definitively 
use. All these things share a major source of life and showcase 
a place where people's minds become one. In other words…

text_block_list.name: Rudolf & C.B.
text_block_list.text: A race.

text_block_list.name: Academy Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text:
Did you see? Apparently, they're holding a special race 
for those that submitted stuff for the pamphlet!

text_block_list.name: Academy Horsegirl B
text_block_list.text:
Because anyone could have submitted materials, anyone 
can participate in the race. That's really interesting. 
This is a chance for all types of people to race…!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Well, you sure are putting in a lot of effort into training. I sure 
wasn't expecting you to come to this special race head on.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text:
That's rich coming from someone that registered us 
both without asking. You didn't just stop at that, 
you just also had to drag Pokke into this too.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
From the race with Gungnir, I was able to get some good data. 
However, I just happened upon another chance to get more. 
You can never have too many samples, can you?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Also, I know that you also would like to test yourself. 
I wonder what sort of running we are able to have 
from running together.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Fufu. Seeing you run here so seriously, I bet 
you're thinking the same.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text:
I-I just felt the urge to test my own strength. 
And just wanted to maybe improve it……

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: This is just a situation that happened to pop up. That's all.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: She wanted to test and improve her strength, huh?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Kuku. In the end, you're no different from me. This is turning 
out to be quite an interesting race, don't you think so Pokke?

text_block_list.name: Jungle Pocket
text_block_list.text:
Ora ora ora ora ora ora! I can still keep going 
faster! You lot better not hold back either!!

text_block_list.name: Head of Gungnir
text_block_list.text: Y-yes!!!

text_block_list.name: Jungle Pocket
text_block_list.text:
Alright. After our break, go for another round. We're going 
to keep going until we vomit our guts out. Come on!

text_block_list.name: Head of Gungnir
text_block_list.text: Understood!!

text_block_list.name: Jungle Pocket
text_block_list.text:
Tachyon. Café. From that previous race, 
I feel I got to know you two really well.

text_block_list.name: Jungle Pocket
text_block_list.text:
I still don't know what exactly goes through your mind, 
but on that day, your running was saying…

text_block_list.name: Jungle Pocket
text_block_list.text:
"I want to crush anyone stronger than me" and 
"I will definitely win this race." That was the sort 
of feeling I could feel overflowing from you two.

text_block_list.name: Jungle Pocket
text_block_list.text:
Your faces made it clear as day. In the end, you two are like me. 
You are horsegirls that are gunning for the peak…!

text_block_list.name: Jungle Pocket
text_block_list.text:
This is getting interesting. No matter what, I will take down 
anyone who tries to take the peak from me……!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: Huff, huff, huff. Hah.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text:
…Nee-sama gave me the challenge to try to pay her back in this 
special race. I can't show her such disappointing running again.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text:
The current me has no desire to remain in your 
shadow any longer! I'll prove that to you……!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: ……… Excuse me, Ramonu?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
Why did you choose to have me participate in this special race 
as the person that submitted the photos…?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu
text_block_list.text:
What a strange question. 
Is it not true that you wish to run with me?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: That's…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu
text_block_list.text:
"There's no way I can do that?" 
Is what you were going to say, Dober?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu
text_block_list.text:
When Ardan and I were facing off, I could tell that you 
were itching for a fight. It is because you too wish to run.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu
text_block_list.text:
In that case, do not hold back. 
In return, I will accept your feelings.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu
text_block_list.text: That endless, burning heart of yours. I want to see it in the race.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
All I could do before was watch from far away and admire you. 
But during the special race…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
I would like to run my own race against you and the others! 
I want to face you head on with all I got!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
And with that, I would like to make my running 
a race that you could never forget…!!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu
text_block_list.text: Fufu. What a precious girl. I will be looking forward to facing you.
